actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 3146 (relating to release of defendants in noncapital Federal criminal cases prior to trail) of title 18 of the United States Code to permit consideration of the defendant's possible danger to the community.

summary.text: Allows judicial officers to deny pre-trial release of defendants in non-capital cases if there is no reasonable assurance that such person will not pose a danger to other individuals or the community.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3146 (relating to release of defendants in noncapital Federal criminal cases prior to trail) of title 18 of the United States Code to permit consideration of the defendant's possible danger to the community.
